channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0803|2024-05-24T07:35:51.571Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- melsec-q%20series%20q03udecpu
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.
